designSystem.description: A clean, highly rounded, and accessible interface that balances utility with a friendly aesthetic. It relies on soft shadows for elevation, pill-shaped interactive elements, and high-contrast dual-tone surfaces to guide user focus.

headingFont.usage: Used for primary page titles, hero sections, modal headers, and editorial-style emphasis to add a touch of elegance and hierarchy.

bodyFont.usage: The workhorse font for all UI copy, paragraphs, button labels, inputs, and data display. Chosen for its geometric clarity and excellent legibility at small sizes.

top.style: Integrated smoothly into the top of the container, separated only by subtle spacing or a highly transparent 1px divider.
top.elements: Contains pill-shaped dropdowns and icon buttons.

bottomAction.style: A floating or docked dark container contrasting sharply with the main white surface. Highly rounded corners (pill shape).
bottomAction.elements: Circular icon buttons (white/light gray) evenly spaced.

buttons.primary: Pill-shaped, dark charcoal background with white text. Hover states shift to a slightly lighter gray.
buttons.secondary: Pill-shaped or rounded rectangle, light gray background with dark text.
buttons.icon: Perfectly circular when in dark containers, or square with soft rounded corners (8px-12px) in light toolbars. Active states in light toolbars use a white background with a soft drop shadow (raised elevation).
buttons.dropdown: Pill-shaped with a soft gray background, featuring text alongside a subtle chevron.

inputs.text: Borderless appearance within the main white surface, relying on the container for structure. Generous padding (16px+).
inputs.mentions: Inline pill shape with a light gray background (#E5E7EB) and slightly bolder text to stand out from regular paragraph text.
inputs.forms: Standard form fields should use a soft gray background (#F3F4F6) with no border, adding a subtle border or shadow only on focus.

attachments.style: Square with rounded corners (12px). Features a soft drop shadow.
attachments.statusIndicators: Overlapping circular badges at the top right corner. E.g., a green circle with a white checkmark for success, or a white circle with a gray spinner for loading. These badges must have a 2px white border to separate them visually from the thumbnail.

cards.container: Stark white background, large border radius (24px to 32px), subtle 'raised' shadow against the main app background to create depth.

modals.style: White background, large border radius (24px), deep 'dropdown' shadow. Must include a dark overlay backdrop (e.g., black at 40% opacity).

navigation.sidebar: Light gray background matching the app body, with pill-shaped active states for navigation items.
navigation.tabs: Soft pill-shaped indicators that slide behind the active text, avoiding harsh underlines.
